title: Project Skins
body: After goofing off with my Project Skins for a couple days, Id just like to say," good Fking Job Riot they are amazing."Maybe not as amazing as say Dunkmaster Darius cause hes just too op but still pretty damn good Skin line guys. <3

replies.body:
Hey Acnowlogia,

So glad you like them! Which one is your favorite?
Uh my Current Favorite is Zed because his Red shadows are so freaking cool looking :3

I really wish you put the same effort into Leona and Lucian as you did to Fiora and zed. The fact that they were just thrown in is really easy to see with how boring models and bland animations are by comparison, as well as the fact that they don't synergies as well as other teams.
I would have to agree. These are probably my favorite skins Riot has ever made. Kudos to all who worked on them!
